oai_dc:dc.dc:title: John Sevier
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Painted portrait of John Sevier (1745-1815) by Washington B. Cooper. The painting is a copy of Charles Willson Peale's portrait of the same. Print is cropped and does not show lower portion of portrait, including subject's right hand.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Governors; Military officers; Legislators
Sevier, John, 1745-1815
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Washington B. Cooper
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Colonel, Revolutionary War; founder, State of Franklin; U.S. Rep. from N.C., 1789-1791; first Governor of Tennessee, 1796-1801, 1803-1809; U.S. Rep. from Tenn., 1811-death.
